org.javalite.activejdbc.connection_config.ConnectionSpec

  • Packages that use ConnectionSpec 
    Package Description
    org.javalite.activejdbc
    ActiveJDBC - the agile Java ORM.
    org.javalite.activejdbc.connection_config
    Classes to manage connections to databases.

    • Uses of ConnectionSpec in org.javalite.activejdbc

      Methods in org.javalite.activejdbc that return ConnectionSpec 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConnectionSpec Configuration.getConnectionSpec​(java.lang.String environment)  
      ConnectionSpec Configuration.getCurrentConnectionSpec()
      Finds a connection ConnectionSpec that corresponds to system properties, environment variables of database.properties configuration, whichever is found first.
      Methods in org.javalite.activejdbc with parameters of type ConnectionSpec 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DB DB.open​(ConnectionSpec spec)
      This method is used internally by the framework.
